Package src.pkg_rooms

Class TrapDoor

java.lang.Object
src.pkg_rooms.Door
src.pkg_rooms.TrapDoor
public class TrapDoor extends Door
Represents a trap door in the game that extends a Door. A trap door can either be a regular door or a trap door that may trigger specific behavior.
Author:
Pierre MATAR

  • Constructor Details

    • TrapDoor

      public TrapDoor(boolean pIsLocked, Item pKeyDoor, boolean pIsTrapDoor)
      Constructs a TrapDoor with a specified lock status, key, and trap door status.
      Parameters:
      pIsLocked - Indicates whether the door is locked.
      pKeyDoor - The key (item) required to open the door.
      pIsTrapDoor - Indicates if the door is a trap door.

  • Method Details

    • isTrapDoor

      public boolean isTrapDoor()
      Returns:
      true if the door is a trap door, false otherwise.
